name: Henry
description:
Henry is your very own fairy tale castle.  Part of a series of five pieces taken from a traditional Adams plate.  Each piece is very different, but each features the same brown and white palette.

A circular piece of the plate has been taken and set into a silver plated finding, hung on a delicate, twisted silver plated chain. A gorgeous, unique piece with a vintage feel.

Diameter of the cut ceramic piece: 18mm

Length of the chain: 16 inches

name: The Golden Goose - Wilheim
description:
Taken from a Limited Edition 1979 Wedgewood Children's Story Plate depicting 'The Golden Goose'.  This piece is part of a series of four items, each taken from the same plate.

A circular piece of the plate has been taken and set into a silver plated finding, hung on a delicate, twisted silver plated chain. A gorgeous, unique piece with a vintage feel.

Diameter of the cut ceramic piece: 18mm

Length of the chain: 16 inches

name: The Golden Goose - Jacob
description:
Taken from a Limited Edition 1979 Wedgewood Children's Story Plate depicting 'The Golden Goose'.  This piece is part of a series of four items, each taken from the same plate.

A circular piece of the plate has been taken and set into a silver plated finding, hung on a delicate, twisted silver plated chain. A gorgeous, unique piece with a vintage feel.

name: Emily + Arthur
description:
An old ceramic plate has been given a new life. A circular piece of the plate has been taken and set into a silver plated finding, hung on a delicate, twisted silver plated chain.

Emily + Arthur come from the very same plate, and are happy to go apart, or stay together!

These are gorgeous, unique pieces with a vintage feel.

Diameter of the cut ceramic piece: 18mm

Length of the chain: 16 inches
